title: Sew Who?
subtle: How to (nonfiction), 108 words, Level E (Grade 1), Lexile 330L
description: Are you ready to make an owl? Sew Who? provides students with a step-by-step guide to creating an adorable owl using basic sewing skills. Simple instructions and detailed illustrations support student learning. The book can also be used to teach students how to retell and sequence events.
meta: beak, felt, owl, pin, sew, stuffing
Sequence Events : Determine the sequence of events
Short Vowel Sounds : Discriminate short vowel /i/ sound
High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency words from, two, under

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
